item.title: Docker use Tutorial
item.description: 2021-5-30 更新 老方法不行了 Install docker apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates software-properties-common curl curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg|sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/docker-ce/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs) stable" apt-get update apt-get install docker-ce docker run hello-world # 重启 service docker restart Compose https://gitee.com/xipushi/dockercompose.git chmod +x docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 mv docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 docker-compose cp /use/local/bin docker-compose --version Dockerfile # from based nginx # run start FROM nginx # exec: RUN["./go", "dev", "offline"] RUN echo 'Nginx image' > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.
